Cram.name: CRAM
Cram.description: When <c=action>launching</c> <c=midrow>midrow objects</c>, spend <c=status>CRAM</c> for each already existing <c=midrow>object</c> to fit another one.

CramHarder.name: CRAM HARDER
CramHarder.description: You may <c=action>cram</c> while <c=action>launching</c> <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> as if you had {0} more <c=status>CRAM</c>.

CrammedLaunch.name: Cram
CrammedLaunch.description: The launched <c=midrow>object</c> will be <c=midrow>crammed</c>, regardless of your <c=status>CRAM</c>.

Crammed.name: Crammed
Crammed.description: All <c=midrow>crammed</c> objects take turns in order. The last <c=midrow>crammed</c> object is the one that takes hits.

CardDrone.name: CARD DRONE
CardDrone.description: Beams a card at you once per turn.

description.A: Spend all <c=status>cram</c>. <c=action>Launch</c> that many <c=midrow>crammed heavy missiles</c>.
description.B: Spend all <c=status>cram</c>. <c=action>Launch</c> that many <c=midrow>crammed seeker missiles</c>.
